name: SPIN (Steppers)
description:
Conquer the spinners. Tilt and dodge your way to the top of the leaderboard. Just don't get hit...

***IMPORTANT NOTE***

Users are advised to CONFIGURE/CALIBRATE the sensor before playing.

The tilt controls can be calibrated and sensitivity can be changed from within settings.

Features

  • Customisable colour themes
  • Smooth gameplay
  • And a continuous, never ending tunnel!

Controls

  • Tilt side to side to move the ball sideways
  • Tilt forward to go faster
  • Just avoid the spinners... Easy
